TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmScalarPropertyAttribute extends System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmPropertyAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class EdmScalarPropertyAttribute Inherits EdmPropertyAttribute

Docs.summary: Attribute that indicates that the property represents a scalar property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> properties cannot both be `true` because key members cannot be `null`.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute> links a scalar property on a data class to a property of an entity type or complex type that is defined in the conceptual model.
This attribute is applied to properties that return scalar types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EntityKeyProperty { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EntityKeyProperty : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the property is part of the entity key.
Docs.value: The value that indicates whether the property is part of the entity key.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Because an entity key can contain more than one property, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> can be set to true for more than one property of an entity type.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> properties cannot both be `true` because key members cannot be `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsNullable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsNullable : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the property can have a value.
Docs.value: The value that indicates whether the property can have a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> properties cannot both be `true`.
